thread.title: Two seriously injured after crash in Awakino, Waitomo District
thread.title_full: Two seriously injured after crash in Awakino, Waitomo District

title: Two seriously injured after crash in Awakino, Waitomo District
text:
Two seriously injured after crash in Awakino, Waitomo District Last updated 14:41, February 19 2017 SIMON MAUDE / FAIRFAX NZ 
Police are attending a serious crash in the Waitomo District. 
Traffic is backing up on State Highway 3 in the Waitomo District after a crash which seriously injured two people. 
Emergency services were called to the scene approximately 5km north of the Awakino Tunnel at 1:15pm on Sunday. 
The road is closed and no diversions are in place. The wait could be 90 minutes or more. 
Motorists are asked to avoid the area or to delay travel wherever possible. 
The Serious Crash Unit is investigating. 
(The crash is 5km north of the green tag. Source: GOOGLE MAP)
